title: Gotta give props to Riot for mordekaiser
body:
No longer can we BM the fuck out of rito.
Mordekaiser is actually a meta bot lane juggernaut.

replies.body:
Because he got played in LCS?????  Twice? 
 
Hardly qualifies  as meta. That's less than .00001% of games

Where as being meta. Means being Prevalent throughout.  LCS is only a small part  of this game
